alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 4:01PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central St. Johns County through 430 PM EDT... At 401 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout 8 miles west of Saint Augustine South, or 8 miles west of Saint Augustine, moving south at 5 to 10 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hastings, Spuds, Elkton and Bakersville. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns
